      Methods in de.uniba.wiai.kinf.lehre.ma13.view.interfaces with parameters of type DrawGeometry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ICanvas.addTempGeometry(DrawGeometry tempDrawGeometry, IGeometry tempGeometry, boolean stack)
      as paint() is called asynchronously, use this method to add temporary geometries which should be drawn after clearing/repainting the canvas.
      void ICanvas.setBackgroundDrawer(DrawGeometry drawBackground)
      sets a template for drawing the background
      void ICanvas.setGeometryDrawer(DrawGeometry drawGeometry)
      set a template for drawing different geometries
